checking out this giant thing yeah you should watch some la mars always videos

Here's a comment on the crypted, on the crypted uh, wiki.

No.

"Imagine if this happened in World War II. You were a German soldier in the Russian

That guy's a born storyteller too. I mean you can really see that happening in your mind's eye,
